name: International Cops Racing
description:
Have you ever wanted to race a police car? Well now you can with International Cops Racing!

Come burn up the streets in your police car and shoot up your competition with powerful powerups

International Cops Racing is one of the Most addictive racing game on Appstore !

Drive on this amazing vehicle on stunning terrains.

Game Features
- Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking vehicle
- Unique ,Easy and smooth gameplay
- Exciting
- Different terrains/location
- EASY controls with only 2 buttons
- CRAZY jumps and loops
- Beautiful off-road terrains
- Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
- Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
- Crazy Addictive Experience.
- Environments That Keeps Changing
- Real Animations And Physics.

Download International Cops Racing for Free !
